description: The password must be divided by *9*
The password must contain the answer of the *3!2!*
The password must contain the date of today!
The password must contain the city which held the *2016* Olympics.
The password must contain the name of the most recent FIFA World Cup winning country.
The password must contain the unit of electrical resistance
The password must include the ans of the following sokudo.
The password must include the the answer of the following puzzle (brain teaser/ coded message/ riddle/ puzzling/ chess move/ crossword clue/ logic puzzle etc)
The password must include the the answer of the following language (play an audio)
The password must include the the answer of the following puzzle (oding-related challenge)
